scripts.clean: rm -rf build/* && mkdir -p build/css && mkdir -p build/js
scripts.watch-sass-autoprefixer: node-sass client/scss -o build/tmp/css && node-sass client/scss -o build/tmp/css --source-map=true --source-map-contents=true --source-map-embed=true -w & postcss --use autoprefixer --autoprefixer.browsers 'last 2 versions' -d build/css/ build/tmp/css/*.css -w
scripts.start-sass: npm run watch-sass & npm run browser-sync
scripts.start-sass-autoprefixer: npm run watch-sass-autoprefixer & npm run browser-sync
scripts.start: npm run build && npm run watch-js & npm run watch-sass & npm run browser-sync
scripts.build: npm run clean &&  npm run build-sass && npm run build-js && npm run build-autoprefixer
scripts.build-dev: npm run clean && npm run build-sass-dev && npm run build-js-dev && npm run build-autoprefixer && npm run postinstall
